subject: p17340686
History: Year old woman with COPD and ESRD on HD here with pneumonia and respiratory failure s/p intubation, ET placement.
Findings: The ET tube is 26 cm above the Carina. The right lower lung opacity is again visualized. The heart is moderately enlarged. There is pulmonary vascular redistribution with ill-defined vascularity compatible fluid overload. An underlying infectious infiltrate cannot be excluded. NG tube tip is off the film, at least in the stomach. Severe degenerative changes of the right humeral head are again seen.
Impression: ET tube 26 cm above the Carina.
